1.0.name: wordpress/urdu-date-and-time-display
1.0.description:
This plugin will display all date, time and numbers of WordPress website into Urdu Language. Urdu date and time will be shown according to English calendar only.

Features

  • All dates will be displayed in Urdu numbers.
  • All time will be displayed in Urdu numbers.
  • Name of the seven week days will be displayed in Urdu Language.
  • Name of the months will be displayed in Urdu Language.
  • Display your Dashboard numbers in Urdu.

Credits

  • Developer : Imran Ali Mughal (http://www.imughal.com)
